price: Ariko Farawo yishingikirije ububasha yari afite, atera umugongo (yanga kwemera ubutumwa yari azaniwe), aravuga ati “Uyu ni umurozi cyangwa umusazi.”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
